QAPair.Question: What is (are) Chronic fatigue syndrome - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide information on chronic fatigue syndrome : Solve ME/CFS Initiative -- solvecfs.org , US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/me-cfs , National Fibromyalgia & Chronic Pain Association -- askjan.org/disabilities/Chronic-Fatigue-Syndrome.cfm ,
